ValidationRule.description: SE-1109 - Patient details are required for Canada and the US regions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT( $Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c )
&&
OR( HRCSVC_Ship_To_Location__r.HRCSVC_Region__c = "US" , HRCSVC_Ship_To_Location__r.HRCSVC_Region__c = "Canada" )
&&
OR( ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Patient_First_Name__c ) , ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Patient_Last_Name__c ) )
&&
RecordType.DeveloperName = "Rental_Orders"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Patient's first name and last name.
